original_text: To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts, the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower.
units: To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts , the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower .

original_text: Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution.
units: Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution .
